body.name: Bokadzi 5 Feet 3.5mm Lavalier Microphone Lapel Omnidirectional Condenser Mic for iPhone Android & Windows Smartphones, YouTube, Interview, Studio, Video Recording（with The 4 Pin to 3 Pin Adapter）
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 8 hrs 2 mins

features: 【Wide Compatibility】The mic is specifically designed for android smartphones, iPad, YouTube, Interview, Studio, Video Recording, Noise Cancelling Mic.With the Original Phone Adapter for iPhone, the mic could be used for iPhone or for iPad. NOTE: There is no original adapter for iPhone in the package.
【Easy Plug & Play】You can directly plug the microphone and camera into the 3.5mm port of the phone and start recording. No batteries or drivers are needed before recording audio.
【Superior Sound Quality】3.5mm gold plated plug for secure connection and minimum resistance. OFC wires ensure lossless signal transmission for excellent audio quality.
【Extension of Microphone for More Convenience】– Clip the microphone to your lapel and you can effortlessly record on-the-go and capture better audio quality handily.

【What You Get】1* 3.5mm lavalier microphone with 1.5m/5ft length cable; 1*4 Pin to 3 Pin adaptor; 1*Foam sleeve.If you have any questions during the use of the microphone, please contact our team,we will give you a satisfactory answer.
body.description: Bokadzi 3.5mm Lavalier MicrophoneDesign for Excellent Sound QualityGold Plated Connector：Gold plated plug offers a snug connection and cancels out cracking or humming noise for the best recording quality.Loud and Clear：High-Sensitivity MIC Unit enhance the volume of your sound, ideal to replace the built-in microphone of your devices for on-line conference.No-loss Signal Transmission：Oxygen-free copper wires embedded with Kevlar fibers minimize signal transmission loss and maximize the intensity to high-resolution sound, while also providing great flexibility and durability for daily use.FeaturesOmni-directional Pickup Pattern：The microphone won't miss a sound from any direction, ideal for multi-purpose recording such as vocals, instrument performance, interviewing or vlogging.Handsfree Clip：Just hooks the microphone to your shirt so as to free your hands and focus on your performance, and the MIC won't even be noticed by a camera while you are recording for a YouTube channel or vlog.Thick and Soft Foam：A foam pop shield is supplied to minimize wind noise, popping, explosions for the best audio quality.SpecificationsConnection：3.5mm male(1/8 inch)Cable length：5 Feet/1.5 MPickup pattern：OmnidirectionalPackage contents：1 X Microphone; 1 X 4 Pin to 3 Pin adaptor; 2 X Foam sleeve; 1 X Storage Bag;

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was thinking for such a cheap price this would be pretty low quality, but was actually pleasantly surprised! Cord length is long and the audio quality is a bit better than youd find on a standard phone microphone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars you need headphones to plug in the mic if your using it for discord or any type of Roblox apps
reviews.reviewText: I loved this product and at first I thought because its so cheap it was going to be bad I expected the mic to be bigger to be honest but when I got it the mic was small and I could clip it to my shirt the mic sounds good but I wouldn't recommend if you have a loud background you might have to adjust your mic in your settings I didn't take no pictures because idk how to do it on computer but this is a very good mic for a very cheap price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: At such a low price I was skeptical, but this turned out to be a really great microphone. It isn't professional grade, but it is miles ahead of the typical microphone found on most earbuds.If you are looking for something to record professional audio on, you might be disappointed. But, on the other hand, if you just want a way to greatly improve your audio quality on phones calls or in Zoom meetings, this is a great choice.
